verbose_text: Moreover, overexpression of CRTC2 increased the association between CRTC2 and CREB as well as CREB binding to the cox-2 promoter, luciferase activity of the cox-2 promoter, and COX-2 expression, and diminished the inducing effect of rapamycin in preadipocytes (XREF_FIG).
evidence: CREB binding to the cox-2 promoter, luciferase activity of the cox-2 promoter, and COX-2 expression, and diminished the inducing effect of rapamycin
